rows.label: bf06230100_0010
rows.name:
Um, uh... Nia? It's a bit
difficult to walk...

rows.label: bf06230100_0020
rows.name:
It's fine, it's not like
you're losing anything.

rows.label: bf06230100_0030
rows.name: You're just so warm. I can't help it!

rows.label: bf06230100_0040
rows.name:
It's a function of what's known
as "infrared radiation".

rows.label: bf06230100_0050
rows.name: You're knowledgeable, Gramps.

rows.label: bf06230100_0060
rows.name: I'm not a heater, you know...

rows.label: bf06230100_0070
rows.name: M-my lady...

rows.label: bf06230100_0080
rows.name:
If it's warmth you want How
about getting it from me?

rows.label: bf06230100_0090
rows.name: Homura-sama seems to be a bit troubled.

rows.label: bf06230100_0100
rows.name: No way.

rows.label: bf06230100_0110
rows.name:
Your fur has gotten stiff from the
cold, It's all rough and scratchy.

rows.label: bf06230100_0120
rows.name: But, my lady...

rows.label: bf06230100_0130
rows.name:
Hey, is it just me, or are
the ether lines really dim?

rows.label: bf06230100_0140
rows.name: What are Ether lines?

rows.label: bf06230100_0150
rows.name:
You know. The light lines running
through the Divine Beast's body.

rows.label: bf06230100_0160
rows.name:
That light is the light of Ether. It's
flowing through the Divine Beast's body.

rows.label: bf06230100_0170
rows.name: It's like the flow of blood in humans.

rows.label: bf06230100_0180
rows.name: You've got good eyes.

rows.label: bf06230100_0190
rows.name:
Genbu has pretty bad circulation,
compared to other Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf06230100_0200
rows.name:
The low temperature and difficulty growing
crops are said to be caused by that.

rows.label: bf06230100_0210
rows.name:
Is it kind of like having cold
hands and feet all the time?

rows.label: bf06230100_0220
rows.name: Well... something like that.
